overview: The shocking story of one of the world's most notorious cannibals, Armin Meiwes, who found a willing victim online who agreed to be dismembered and eaten for sexual pleasure. Told by those closest to the case, the documentary discusses how the killer and the victim's lives led to their fatal night together
tagline: The shocking story of Armin Meiwes, one of the world's most notorious cannibals.
title: The Cannibal Next Door
